scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && cd ./example/simple && npm run build && rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy && cp -R dist/* package.json deploy && cp README.md deploy/README.md && cd ../../ && rm -rf deploy && mkdir -p deploy/simple && cp -R ./example/simple/deploy/* ./deploy/simple && cp ./example/index.html ./deploy && node_modules/git-directory-deploy/bin/git-directory-deploy.sh -ddeploy -bgh-pages -rhttps://github.com/flespi-software/QVirtualScroll.git && rm -rf deploy
